Text: Thanks, #1 was hilariously epic - high hopes for this surprising hit :D
Weird to admit but... I like Aquaman ...
everyone does now, seriously :) but i don't want them to make him into Namor 2.0, he should have his own distinct personality. Badass, yes, but also kind-hearted.
fantastic! loads of goodies on this 2nd issue. Reis' Mera is just beautiful and godly at the same time.
